caption.center: LENA STEPHENS, as Personal Representative, Appellant, v. THE CITY OF

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Pierce County, No. 84-2-02542-1, J. Kelley Arnold, J., entered January 3, 1986.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed in part and reversed in part by unpublished opinion per Petrich, J., concurred in by Reed, C.J., and Worswick, J.
